title: Andersonville National Historic Site: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth        A young visitor barters with a living historian portraying a Civil War prisoner. NPS/Eric Leonard   Â    The park has a number of activities for children, including a Junior Ranger Program, programs for school groups, a high school volunteer training program, and numerous opportunities for Scouts and other organized youth groups.  Make more of your visit to Andersonville by participating in one of these programs! Junior Ranger Program Junior Civil War Historian Traveling Clara Barton Civil War to Civil Rights Trading Cards Memory Star Project
